scripts.go-prod:linux: export PROTO=$npm_package_config_prodproto IP=$npm_package_config_prodip PORT=$npm_package_config_prodport STRIPE=$npm_package_config_prodstripe && echo $PROTO://$IP:$PORT && rm -fr ./src/environments/environment.ts && cp -a ./src/environments/environment.tpl.ts ./src/environments/environment.ts && sed -i "s/{{BACKEND_PROTO}}/${PROTO}/g" ./src/environments/environment.ts && sed -i "s/{{HOST_FQDN}}/${IP}/g" ./src/environments/environment.ts && sed -i "s/{{BACKEND_HTTPS_PORT}}/${PORT}/g" ./src/environments/environment.ts && sed -i "s/{{STRIPE_CLIENT_KEY}}/${STRIPE}/g" ./src/environments/environment.ts

scripts.deploy: npm run build && rm -fr /var/www/callmetrics/* && cp -ax ./dist/Epic/* /var/www/callmetrics/ && chown -R 33:33 /var/www/callmetrics/
